ygData.subject: RE: Getting a good item!  and selling it
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmph, I won $570,603.54 in the 1987 Florida Lottery.  I m happy as a F***ing lark =) ... Changed my lifestyle alright. I bought a new house, car, and a
ygData.messageBody:
>Most lottery winners in real life are not happier than before they won.

Hmph, I won $570,603.54 in the 1987 Florida Lottery. I'm happy as a F***ing lark =)

>In fact, the happiest ones tend to be the ones who don't change their lifestyle

Changed my lifestyle alright. I bought a new house, car, and a wife LOL

>Sense of achievement, contribution, and self-worth are what matters to most.

Hmmm, I achieved over $150.00 in my bank account for more than 2 consecutive weeks.
I contributed to charity...once. To get a tax break.
My self-worth was over half-a-mil! /cheer

LOL, sorry -- couldn't pass up the humor I saw in that obvious line of bullshit John fed you. No offense John, you make a lot of sense in your posts and I enjoy reading them, but this one tickled me pink. Ok, Tiger-go get'em. =)


Michael Steele
WVRK Columbus, ROCK 103
Cumulus Broadcasting, Inc
Columbus, GA
